10.title: Il tombarolo
10.plot: Fabbri, (grumpily) Rex and (denying to be a fan) inspector Morini miss a soap episode to examine the scene of the shooting of Marco Pagani (37), a remarkably well-housed unemployed Roman. Fingerprints lead to trucker Fiocca, who transported wooden crates for him. They contained Etruscan art finds on a Ghini's building site, which would be shut down for a proper dig of officially reported. The team reconstructs the fencing tracks which the killer tries ruthlessly to blank, using violence again.

1.title: Il campione
1.plot: While investigating a murder, Rex and his partner Inspector Fabbri uncover an illegal dog fighting operation involving stray dogs.

2.title: Centauri
2.plot: Youngster Stefano Bianchi is killed in an illegal motorbike race. His bike was sabotaged, and he drugged. His fiancée Fabiola admits the dope in their apartment was supplied to both of them by dealer Germano 'the rat' Luccheri, who says there is big betting on the street races. Lorenzo's team also examines Stefano's employer, Ernesto Di Clemente's garage. Morini poses as a new racer. Rex apparently suffers from depression.

3.title: L'ululato
3.plot: Professor De Vitis, a retired physician and president of a prestigious golf clubs in Rome, is found dead on his own golf course. The investigations are more complicated than expected for Inspector Fabbri and Rex, as almost all members of the club have a motive for the murder.

4.title: La mia banda suona il rock
4.plot: The murder of night club singer Daria demands special commitment from Inspector Fabbri, as she was a close friend of Fabbri's on-off girlfriend Katia Martelli, a forensic expert and part-time singer.

5.title: Minuti contati
5.plot: Inspector Fabbri and Morini and Rex team up with the secret service to join in the hunt for a terrorist who has threatened to blow up a local conference.

6.title: Bravi ragazzi
6.plot: Inspector Fabbri and Rex are called to investigate the death of rich kid Tony, who has been stabbed at his 20th birthday party while his friends were all watching a fireworks display.

7.title: Occhi di gatto
7.plot: When Countess Clotilde Sanfelice falls to her death from a window of her house in front of two horrified witnesses, a homeless woman who is seen fleeing the house is suspected of having murdered her. Rex and Inspectors Fabbri and Morini investigate the suspicious death.

8.title: I nomi delle stelle
8.plot: A few nights before the comet named after him is due to appear, astronomer Varinelli is working in the observatory when he is blinded by some eye drops he uses. An investigation discovers foul play and Inspector Fabbri and Rex get on the case.

9.title: Un caso freddo
9.plot: Inspector Fabbri and Rex are asked to investigate the apparent suicide of a Slavic carer, Milica, that had been archived by police seventeen years earlier. The investigation leads them to the Ricolfi family were Milica worked as a carer for Nicola, an autistic boy.

10.title: Musica maestro
10.plot: Inspector Fabbri and Rex, along with Inspector Morini, investigate the murder of a renowned concert pianist in his dressing room after a concert. They find the draft of a will and a petition for divorce left by the maestro.

11.title: La ragazza scomparsa
11.plot: Katia has won a cruise for two and takes Lorenzo Fabbri as her reluctant guest. Meanwhile, Rex manages to sneak on board the ship, and they both become involved in the case of a missing passenger.

12.title: La maledizione del Caravaggio
12.plot: While Inspector Fabbri, Morini and Rex are attending a conference on Malta, Italian art expert Ranieri falls victim to a poison attack. Gori demands that his investigators help their Maltese colleagues with the case.

1.title: Ombre
1.plot: When some human bones are found, Inspector Fabbri's team is called in for a forensic assessment. DNA testing concludes the bones are the remains of Alessandro Solferino, a young man who disappeared three years earlier. Fabbri soon discovers that the deceased's father, a wealthy businessman, has some skeletons in his closet.

2.title: In mezzo ai lupi
2.plot: Everyone is in shock when Chief Inspector Lorenzo Fabbri is killed by a car bomb during a trap set by a Mafia boss.

3.title: Gioco sottobanco
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: Una promessa dal passato
4.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

5.title: Vendetta
5.plot: Inspector Rivera and his team are called to the scene of what appears to be a suicide. Apparently, a member of White Brotherhood, a neo-Nazi movement, has jumped off an eight-storey building. But suspicion is raised about the suicide theory as the investigation links the case to similar deaths a few years before.

6.title: Profondo Blu
6.plot: When a talented young athlete dies while competing in a swimming championship, everyone is shocked that his death was caused by a reaction to ephedrine, an illegal substance. Inspector Rivera and his team are called in to find out if the young swimmer took the substance of his own accord or whether he was the victim of foul play.

7.title: La casa degli spiriti
7.plot: Inspector Rivera's former girlfriend, Sara, rings him seeking help. She's seen her partner Francesco hanging from a tree in her garden. But when Rivera arrives, the body isn't there, and his team begins to raise doubts about Sara's state of mind. A reappearance by Francesco causes Sara to question her own sanity.

8.title: Tutto in una notte
8.plot: After a raging night at a disco, Marco and his mates return to his car where they find the body of Marco's murdered father in the boot. Inspector Rivera and his team are called in for the usual investigation, but while Marco is the prime suspect, somehow things don't quite add up.

9.title: Una vita per una vita
9.plot: Valentina Cavalli is a key witness in a conspiracy trial against a bank. On the day she is due to appear in court to testify, a gas explosion occurs in the flat next door to hers. The gas mains have been tampered with and it's obvious that someone wants her dead. But who is behind the attack? Inspector Rivera and Rex investigate.

10.title: Il terzo uomo
10.plot: In downtown Rome, three men are shot dead at the same time in three different spots. It's immediately clear that this is the work of a first-class marksman. But while two of the victims have no ID, the third one turns out to be a Colombian student. Something doesn't add up. Inspector Rivera and Rex are called in to investigate.

11.title: Bandiera a mezz'asta
11.plot: Inspector Rivera and Rex receive a strange visit from a war widow, who claims the ghost of her dead husband is responsible for the murder of a man and the bashing of another. The 'ghost' however is more - and less - than it appears to be.

12.title: Sinfonia imperfetta
12.plot: When Clara is found dead in her husband's car after a crash, Inspector Rivera suspects that it was no accident and gets to work to investigate her death with the help of Rex. He finds everyone seems to have a good motive for killing Clara: her jealous husband, her lover, and the step-daughters who hated her.

1.title: La Tigre
1.plot: Inspector Davide Rivera and Rex investigate the case of a circus animal trainer who is mauled by a tiger. The death seems accidental until Rex finds out an ultrasound whistle was used to train the tiger to attack.

2.title: Superstar
2.plot: When an actress is killed, Inspector Rivera and Rex are called to investigate and soon find that a number of people had a motive to get rid of her - including her producer, her co-star, and his wife. Meanwhile, Rex discovers he has a talent for acting.

3.title: Un delitto quasi perfetto
3.plot: When a man is found dead in his private sauna, Inspector Rivera and Rex investigate the suspicious circumstances in which the sauna door was jammed shut, causing the man to suffer a heat-induced heart attack. Soon Rivera finds that the man's mistress, his brother and his girlfriend all had a motive to kill him.

4.title: Il tempo non guarisce le ferite
4.plot: When a young labourer falls to his death at a building site, Inspector Rivera and Rex suspect foul play. They soon discover that he had been the toy boy of the rich widow who owns the site, until he had fallen in love with her daughter.

5.title: Una voce nella folla
5.plot: The illegitimate daughter of a wealthy man becomes the target of her half-sister's plot to kill her to avoid sharing her father's inheritance. Not knowing why she has been targeted, the girl goes into hiding. Meanwhile, Inspector Rivera and Rex set out to find the missing girl.

6.title: L'intruso
6.plot: Inspector Rivera and Rex go to a charity event in a wealthy man's villa, only to become trapped in a hostage situation. A group of masked men hold the party guests hostage demanding the combination of a safe. But the host has escaped and is reluctant to give them the combination.

7.title: Due uomini e un bebé
7.plot: When Rivera and Rex are called to investigate a double murder case, they find a baby girl inside a van. This leads them to uncover an illegal adoption racket, secretly run by a non-profit adoption agency. While trying to solve the case, Rivera and his colleagues at the police station are literally left holding the baby.

8.title: Blackout
8.plot: A boy is shot dead in a hotel room and a girl falls out of a window from the same room. She's still alive but the trauma has caused her a total memory loss. Davide Rivera has to rely on forensic evidence and Rex's help to track down the killer.

9.title: Un colpo al cuore
9.plot: When a girl answers a cry for help, she finds a man locked in the boot of his car along with his wife, who's been stabbed to death with a Serbian army knife. Inspector Rivera and Rex are called to investigate and focus their attention on the knife and a possible connection to the Serbian army.

10.title: Il lato oscuro
10.plot: Two criminal brothers with a grudge against Inspector Rivera kidnap Rex and inject him with a pheromone to make him aggressive, and then use him in a series of robberies. Rex is now considered dangerous and the police are ordered to destroy him. Rivera is desperate to find Rex before the police and try to save him.

11.title: Il Grigio
11.plot: Inspector Rivera and Rex are after an elusive criminal called 'The Grey', but must compete with a rogue policeman Paolo Miano, who is also looking for the offender, seeking revenge for the death of his brother. Their efforts are thwarted by a mole who is always one step ahead of their moves.

12.title: Legami di sangue
12.plot: A politician speaking at a rally in support of tough laws to constrain the power of the banks is shot. The supposed assassin, an Arab, is quickly located by a bodyguard and also shot dead. Forensic evidence, however, points elsewhere, and when the bodyguard himself is killed, Inspector Rivera grows more certain of a conspiracy involving top politicians and bankers.

1.title: Festa di laurea
1.plot: A professor from an online university is found murdered in a suburb of Rome. The investigations focus on the university, and Inspector Terzani and Rex explore the variegated world of the online Faculty, which has bases in Rome, Novedrate and Messina. The professor had taught cultural anthropology, and it is this discipline which puts the inspector on the track of a mysterious spiritual community which the professor had suggested as the subject of a graduation thesis on the method of "participating observation".

2.title: Terzo tempo
2.plot: The president of a rugby club, Eugenio Sartor, is killed in his home shortly after watching a team training session. Sartor, the owner of the Eagles, had been forced to seek help from his brother-in-law Mazzilli to put the club's finances in order. Mazzilli had thus become the victim's business partner, relinquishing his ownership of a second division football club. Terzani and Rex are initially suspicious of one of the players, Michele Caccia, and then of a criminal implicated in a football match-fixing scandal, Merlo. The latter, however, is shot dead by Mazzilli ...

3.title: Cioccolata amara
3.plot: When the president of a chocolate factory, Ruggiero Onorati, dies from eating a poisoned chocolate, Terzani and Rex focus their investigation on the man's family, where various bitter conflicts come to light. The victim's sister, Giulia Onorati, had angrily fallen out with him over company strategy concerning the family chocolate business. However, the investigations are turned upside down when an epidemic of botulinus poisoning - a toxin contained in a batch of chocolate snack biscuits produced by the victim's company - hits Rome.

4.title: Wunderkammer
4.plot: Terzani and Rex investigate when the wealthy owner of a construction company is killed by a rifle shot during a hunting party.

5.title: Lotta di classe
5.plot: A female teacher taking part in a school outing to Rome comes to the police station to report that one of her students, Sara Borelli, has been bullied and drugged while she was in the hotel. Interrogated by Terzani, Sara recounts how she had been unwittingly drugged by classmate Clara Moretti. But then Clara's dead body is found just near the police station, having fallen from the bathroom window of her hotel room. What at first had seemed a tragic accident soon turns out to be a case of murder among classmates - and possibly a teacher. But the terrible truth will ...

6.title: Tango assassino
6.plot: An irresistibly attractive tango teacher, Corrado Fanti, is found murdered in his tango school. He has been poisoned, and his home ransacked in search of something. The investigations concentrate on the tensions and romances surrounding the handsome teacher's relations with his female students, perpetually competing for the privilege of dancing - and more - with him. While investigating, Terzani and Rex discover that the school's female tango teacher is being targeted by the same killer.

7.title: Magicland
7.plot: While Terzani, Rex and Monterosso are enjoying themselves at the 'Magicland' amusement park, a dancer named Marie who performs in one of the shows is found murdered. The investigations focus on the professional rivalries and jealousies between assorted dancers and stunt men, and then on Massimo Forghieri, the park's director, whom Terzani and Rex discover runs a thriving illegal amphetamine trade among his employees. But the solution to the murder case is far more complex and contorted, and has its roots in a series of tragic events in the past which continue to cause...

8.title: Notte in bianco
8.plot: An undercover policeman, Michele Rossi, infiltrated in a major criminal organisation, is ambushed and killed by two mysterious professional killers. Inspector Terzani, a close friend of the victim, disobeys Gori's orders and conducts his own investigation. In incognito, Terzani and Rex get themselves admitted as patients in a luxurious private clinic run by an important specialist, Dr. Nevio Cangelosi.

9.title: A pezzi
9.plot: A senior post office official is murdered in his flat. Terzani and Rex's investigations seem to point to the victim's ex-wife, who has never resigned herself to her husband's separation. So many clues seem to lead to her that Gori decides to detain her for further questioning. Terzani and Rex, however, discover that the situation is much more complex and dangerous, as they find themselves on the track of a mysterious dismantled atomic bomb which a gang of Chinese criminals are smuggling through Italy. Having succeeded in intercepting some components of the bomb, the ...

10.title: Gli artisti del rimorchio
10.plot: Rex and Terzani find themselves catapulted into the world of struggling singles. Antonio Tassinari, known professionally as Excel - a renowned seduction instructor who conducts courses teaching shy men how to overcome their inhibitions- is stabbed to death in a lounge bar while carrying out a "practical lesson". Terzani follows various leads that introduce him to the milieu of Master Mind, the ultimate guru for timid would-be seducers. The victim appears to have been killed by one of his numerous female conquests, but all of the possible traces are dead-ends. But the ...

imdb.title: Il commissario Rex
plot: A spin off from the German series Kommissar (Inspector) Rex. Rex the Police Dog moves from Vienna to Rome to continue his career.
